## Slide 1

-   Unsupervised data analysis, i.e. leaving the labels completely out
    the labels.

-   Searched for best clustering leaving SH out.

-   Reimplemended paper based on mean part abundance (silhouette score
    0.70 vs 0.57 in Pnas ) and improved significantly.

$$
\text{Mean Part Abundance} = \frac{\sum (\text{Abundance of Each Skeletal Part})}{\text{Number of Distinct Skeletal Parts}}
$$
